articles.title: Sir Ian McKellen: Actor falls off stage during London performance - BBC.com
articles.description: Sir Ian McKellen was in a fight scene when he lost his footing and fell off stage at Noël Coward theatre.
articles.content:
Sir Ian McKellen has been taken to hospital after falling off stage during a performance of Player Kings at the Noël Coward theatre in London.
The 85-year-old actor was in a fight scene when he lost… [+1518 chars]
